verses.roman:
yei yei kahila, prabhu sakali khaṇḍila
uttara nā āise mukhe, mahā-stabdha haila

synonyms: yei yei kahila—whatever he spoke; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; sakali khaṇḍila—refuted everything; uttara—answer; nā āise—could not come; mukhe—in his mouth; mahā-stabdha haila—he became greatly stunned.
translation: Whatever arguments he put forward, the Lord refuted them all. Finally the person became stunned and could not speak.
